feed.title: SAP Community - SAP Analytics Cloud
feed.subtitle: SAP Analytics Cloud Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Customer Public Dimension with wrong spatial data
entry.content:
Hi guys 

I'm having this problem in all data model .

One or multiple members of dimension "CUSTOMER" are empty, or their associated values do not match the supported spatial data.

Are 6 cutomers and all this customers are from Taiwan- 
iso code is mapped with TW 

What is wrong ? 

Any idea how to fix thi problem ?

entry.title: No e-mail notification from SAC calendar tasks when the owner and the assignee are one and the same?
entry.content:
Dear experts, 

In SAP analytics cloud calendar we created a task with owner and assignee one and the same user. 
There is no notification received when the task was activated. For other tasks the same user received notifications , but in case the owner and the assignee are one the same, there is no notification. Is this how the system is designed to work or this is a bug?

Is there a workaround to receive notification?

 

thank you!

entry.title: Data Action to copy from classic model to new model
entry.content:
Hi,

The following data action to copy data from a classic model to new model has errors below. How do I resolve the errors for a working solution?

DATA("SignedData", [d/Date, d/Version, d/GL_ACCOUNT, d/AUDIT_TRAIL, d/BUSINESS_STREAM, d/DEPARTMENT, d/LOCATION, d/SUPPLIER, d/ASSET,d/CAPEX,d/CUSTOMER,d/COMPANY])
= LINK([FINANCE], [d/Date=%pDate%, d/Version=%pVersion%,d/GL_ACCOUNT,d/AUDIT_TRAIL,d/BUSINESS_STREAM,d/DEPARTMENT, d/LOCATION, d/SUPPLIER, d/ASSET,d/CAPEX,d/CUSTOMER,d/COMPANY], "Measures")

1. Mismatching 'SignedData'; expecting ')'

2. Mismatching input ','; expecting '='

Thanks,

Rajash

entry.title: Dynamic Calculated Measure
entry.content:
Hello Team!


I want to create a Calculated Measure that retrieves the total number of employees from the previous month (in this case, 3), adds the number of hires for the current month (in this case, 1), and subtracts the number of terminations (in this case, 2).
I need this Calculated Measure to be dynamic and automatically perform the calculations and fill in the values through to the end of the year.

entry.title: I want to display the “year and month” of the system date in SAP Analytics Cloud.
entry.content:
Hello Community,

Is there a way to display the “year and month” of the system date in text or chart titles in SAP Analytics Cloud?

The system date can be displayed as “year, month, day” in dynamic text, but I would like to display only “year and month.”

If anyone knows how to do this, please let me know.

 

Thanks best regards.

Hello

entry.title: I want to freely display the dimensions and measures of the SAC table in a flat format.
entry.content:
Hello Community,

Do you know how to display dimension items and measure items together in SAP Analytics Cloud tables?

When you add dimension items and measure items to the table, the dimension items are grouped together on the left.
The measure items are grouped together on the right. For example, as shown in ②.

We want to display items on the table in a flat state, without dividing them into left and right sides, as shown in ①.

If anyone knows how to do this, please let me know.

Thanks best regards.

entry.title: SAC 2025 Q3 QRC Optimized Story API - Is there a change in DataSource.getMeasures() behavior?
entry.content:
Hello, I am using SAC Analytics Cloud and utilize scripts to enhance the functionality of optimized stories.  Last week we received latest quarterly update (2025 Q3 QRC, version 2025.14.8).  After the update, I noticed the behavior of DataSource.getMeasures() has changed. 

The API Reference says this method "Returns all measures of the data source" and this was exactly the behavior before.  Now it only returns the first 200 measures, just like the default behavior of DataSource.getMembers().  This causes problem for my existing stories because our queries usually contain 200+ measures (model-defined measures + story calculations). 
To make it worse, now the story calculations are indexed after model-defined measures (before the update: calculations first), so calculations are almost never included in getMeasures() method.

Is this an intended change?  Shall I modify the scripts in stories now, or wait for a fix in next versions? Thanks.

entry.title: When consuming a BW query through an import connection in SAC, users are unable to view prompt
entry.content:
Dear SAP Team,

In SAP Analytics Cloud (SAC), we created an import model based on a BW query that includes parameters. While consuming this import model in SAC, we can view and apply filters using the BW parameters. However, the functionality to view or change the full list of parameter values directly in the SAC report is not available. Also, there is no option to select all available values for the BW parameters while creating the SAC import model. 

The model was created by selecting specific parameter values, along with the necessary dimensions and measures, and applying required data transformations during the import process. 

Best Regards,

Govardhan

entry.title: Story Report- Latest Position Record Retrieval
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I am required to create a report that extracts specific Matrix Relationship data (for example: related position and related position incumbent etc.), maintained against positions.


When I start with Position as source table, the preview query does not display the most recent position data (historical position data is also being shown), resulting in inaccurate data from other related tables.

I would appreciate your assistance in determining how to retrieve the latest record of the position along with its associated data.

entry.title: Widget Margin feature in the 2025 Q3 update
entry.content:
Genuine question..

what on earth is the point of the widget margin feature?
If for example we want a widget within a panel to be 10px from the edge of the margin, surely you'd just set the widget layout values accordingly.

entry.title: SAC error message when deleting Change Log: Failed to parse response Correlation ID: XXX
entry.content:
Hi experts,

I have a model in SAC that it generates many change logs.
First system message was: You have used up 107.37% of your data change log capacity for model "XXX".
I am following the instructions of SAP note: 3639457 - SAC: Data Change Log, Audit Log Handling.

Security > Data Changes > Select a model > Select the filters.

After selecting the range for deletion, SAC returned a message: 
Failed to parse response Correlation ID: 25352647412841219018816626172092

I have Admin rights.

Any idea how to fix/delete it?

Thanks

Carlos

entry.title: No data retrieved using C_MarketSegmentQ2501 or 2CCFIMARKSEGMQ2501 in SAC
entry.content:
Hi experts , 

is there a reason because no data is retrieved using C_MarketSegmentQ2501 or 2CCFIMARKSEGMQ2501 in SAC?

I can use them on query browser in SAP but not in SAC.

Mandatory parameter are managed correctly but no data is retrieved.

Little confused..

Gildo

entry.title: I want to color the SAC input controls according to the situation.
entry.content:
Hello Community,

Is there a way to color-code the SAC input control options?
I want to color-code them according to their status, such as “selected,” “not selected,” and “unselectable.”

This is the image we are aiming for.
In this example,
Green: Selected.
Gray: Cannot be selected.
Colorless: Can be selected, but is not selected.

 

If anyone knows how to do this, please let me know.

Thanks best regards.

entry.title: I want to display the legend titles on the SAC chart.
entry.content:
Hello Community,

When displaying legends on SAC charts, is it possible to display the legend titles as well?

This is the image we want to achieve.

 

If anyone knows how to do this, please let me know.

Thanks best regards.

entry.title: Cross Model Copy Data Action Different Hierarchy Levels
entry.content:
Hello,

I'm trying to copy Budget data from Tactical Model on Job Family Level to a different model on operational level. The operational model has Job Role with Property Job Family and has level based hierarchy Job Family -> Job Role where as tactical only has Job Family.

I'm using the cross model copy option. when I map the Job Family to job role I don't have an option to map Family to Family. instead what ends up happening is that the data is copied from Job family from tactical model to each job role in the operational model so I end up for example for 3 job roles with 3 of the same budget number. see image below. 

How do I handle this situation so that the budget from job family stops at job family level in operational instead of budget exploding x3 or x4 depending on leaf job roles? 

Thank you

entry.title: I want to change the background color when there is no value in the SAC table.
entry.content:
Hello Community,

In the SAC table, “-” is displayed when there is no value in a cell.
At the same time, is it possible to change the background color of the cell to gray?

The image on the right is the specific image I am aiming for.

 

If anyone knows how to do this, please let me know.

Thanks best regards.

entry.title: Position of SAC input control check box
entry.content:
Hello Community,

In the SAC input control, checkboxes are displayed to the left of the text.
Is it possible to change the position of the checkboxes to the right of the text?

The right side of the image is an example of what we are aiming for.

If anyone knows how to do this, please let me know.

Thanks best regards.

entry.title: Select Conversions' do not display conversion rate 'P' in SAC
entry.content:
Dear SAP community,

Select Conversions' do not display conversion rate 'P' in SAC.

We have a live BW connection to SAC, created a model and story on top of BW query. But in tabular view -> 'Select Conversions' -> 'Currency conversion type' -> we only see Exchage rate (M) but not created Exchange rate (P) in the drop-down list.

I also tried to create a ZP* conversion type and assign this to query in 'conversions' tab. But then too no use. Kindly suggest how to see P rate in the drop down. 

Best Regards,

Govardhan

entry.title: SAC to ECC Data Retraction
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

Can anybody please confirm if data retraction to SAP ECC from SAC is available ?

Our setup contain BW middleware but its not HANA its based on MSSQL and we are on NEO environment so we cant utilize the DES (Data Export Service).

Thank you.
